Isekai Affair: Ten Years After the Demon King's Subjugation
the Married Former Hero and the Female Warrior Who Lost Her Husband
異世界不倫～魔王討伐から十年、妻とはレスの元勇者と、夫を亡くした女戦士～
Isekai Affair: 10 Years After Defeating the Demon King, the Hero Cheats on His Wife with a Warrior Woman Who Lost Her Husband

title: Isekai Furin: Maou Toubatsu kara 10-nen, Tsuma to wa Less no Motoyuusha to, Otto wo Nakushita Onna Senshi
title_english: Isekai Affair: 10 Years After Defeating the Demon King, the Hero Cheats on His Wife with a Warrior Woman Who Lost Her Husband
title_japanese: 異世界不倫～魔王討伐から十年、妻とはレスの元勇者と、夫を亡くした女戦士～
title_synonyms: Isekai Affair: Ten Years After the Demon King's Subjugation
the Married Former Hero and the Female Warrior Who Lost Her Husband
synopsis:
Getting hit by a truck and sent to another world to face off against the Demon King was the best thing that ever happened to Yuuta. He attained unmatched powers, saved the world, and even married the princess. But now that the adventure's over, he finds himself in a boring, sexless marriage with no battles left to fight. The only excitement he can find comes from sneaking out for intimate nights with his former party member. Can the powers he once used to save the realm keep him from getting busted by his royal family?

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
background: Isekai Furin: Maou Toubatsu kara 10-nen, Tsuma to wa Less no Motoyuusha to, Otto wo Nakushita Onna Senshi has been published in English as Isekai Affair: 10 Years After Defeating the Demon King, the Hero Cheats on His Wife with a Warrior Woman Who Lost Her Husband by Seven Seas Entertainment since January 7, 2025.
